review: Google Chromecast is very easy to configure and use.Just, install, configure the wifi connection and stream content from You tube, Netflix, PLEX, Revision3, Filmon and much much others, from your cell phone or tablet.Just browse the content you want to watch from your portable devices, specially the Android ones... select the Chromecast icon and thats it, watch the content on your big TV screen...Do not confuse it with AirPlay, seems similar but it is better, it sends the URL of the video from your tablet to your Chromecast, and it negociate again with the content provider the quality of the video at its maximun (depending on your internet connection) but it is not a streaming from your tablet/cell phone to the TV, assuring the best quality availiable for the same content.The amount of video apps avaliable with Chromecast support grows every day.
